Education

There are various choices of study programs and levels of education that you can choose at the Universitas Sumatera Utara. Search by course options and degree type to find the best educational program for you.

Undergraduate
Program

The undergraduate program at the University of North Sumatra can be followed by SMA/SMK/MA/MAK graduates, can be taken within 8-14 semesters, to produce graduates who can contribute to the advancement of science and technology.

Postgraduate
Program

USU offers advanced study programs at the masters and doctoral levels held in faculties and graduate schools, to produce graduates who can contribute both to research and to make a direct contribution to society.

Diploma
Specialist
Program

The Vocational School offers a variety of Diploma study programs that focus on equipping students with skills relevant to the demands of the world of work.

Profession
Program

Professional programs are intended for graduates of certain study programs as a condition for obtaining a professional degree, to produce graduates with special skill requirements.

Community Services

Universitas Sumatera Utara has one of the institutions that serve as a forum for managing service activities to the community called the Community Service Institute Society (LPPM).
